alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 9:18AM EDT until April 05 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Buren County in southwestern Michigan... Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... Western Kalamazoo County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1015 AM EDT. * At 917 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paw Paw Lake, or 10 miles south of South Haven, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Portage... Holland... Allegan... South Haven... Paw Paw... Wayland... Otsego... Plainwell... Hartford... Mattawan... Lawton... Bangor... Decatur... Fennville... Saugatuck... Martin... Van Buren SP... Westwood... Lake Michigan Beach... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southwestern Michigan. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted, act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small interior room. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
